name: Zonescape
description:
You wake up in one of the most secure prison cells in the world. By chance, you end up with a key in your pocket that you can use to open the door and get out.
- Study the security route and quietly collect all the passes to escape.
- Hide in shelters and prison cells.
- Find keys and open the cells of other prisoners.

Open the door in your prison cell and find a way out of the prison.



In order to win, the player must find the door from the prison. But not everything is so simple, before that you need to find 3 passes: red, green and blue. They are securely hidden throughout the territory.
Rescue as many other prisoners as possible by opening their cells.
After each successful escape, you will be given diamonds, for which you can buy a suit; in total, there are 9 different escape suits in the store.

Organize an escape and free all prisoners from the most secure prison in the world!
